NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: Friends, we have successfully completed the excavation of the core of Giant's Deep. With this, the Deep Storm Station takes its first step towards realization! 2 1 AVENS: I expected zero-g at the center of a planet to feel quite different from zero-g in space, but it does not feel dissimilar to working aboard the cannon! Wouldn't you agree, Mallow? 3 2 CASSAVA: I would appreciate if both of you would kindly focus on the task of reinforcing the station's walls! We are surrounded by oceans of pressure; we must fortify the station's integrity with great care! 4 1 CLARY: Daz, I'm almost done installing the new warp receiver within the Deep Storm Station. Once it is ready, it should connect us with the warp transmitter on the Construction Yard! 5 4 CLARY: Of note: as we have sealed ourselves in this space, we will require somebody to warp to our warp receiver to charge a return warp that will allow us to return to the surface! 6 5 DAZ: Have no fear, Clary; I am already waiting on the warp transmitter, eager to see my Cassava again! 7 6 CLARY: You have my gratitude, Daz! The return warp will be most useful in allowing me to excuse myself, before I become trapped in the station with two pairs of gelatinous Nomai. DSS CONV3 1
